name: A walk in the park (GordonZar)
description:
Are you zen enough to make it through the garden?

A very simple and silly game in atari style graphics featuring 10 levels in which you need to collect empty boxes that are left lying around while everything stands in your way of doing so.

Final notes:
--------------
The game was made in 4 days and the expected play time is between 5 - 10 minutes.
